cui_name: Cerebral Autosomal Recessive Arteriopathy with Subcortical Infarcts and Leukoencephalopathy
reasoning: CARASIL is an extremely rare genetic cerebrovascular disorder caused by HTRA1 mutations with <100 confirmed cases worldwide in medical literature. Estimated <0.001 per 100k. Confidence limited by minimal epidemiological data and case report-based evidence only.
